desc: Exude an irresistible aura of attraction; mortals drawn like moths to flame.
name: Crimson Allure

desc: Manipulate appearance subtly, masking pallor, wounds, or hunger to look radiant and alive.
name: Sanguine Glamour

desc: Touch can sap energy, leaving mortals weak as if struck by days of exhaustion.
name: Cradle of Hunger

desc: Plant a blood seed of desire in a mortal; supernatural yearning until accepted or spurned.
name: Blood Seed

desc: Draw vermin and scavengers; influence swarms. Spliced may resist with Mental roll.
name: Carrion Call

desc: Touch a corpse to glean fragments of its memories or final sensations.
name: Bone Whisper

desc: Corrode wood, cloth, or weak flesh; spoil food, weaken doors, inflict painful wounds.
name: Rotting Grasp

desc: Voice heard as a whisper from a grave, carrying dread into minds.
name: Echo of the Barrow

desc: A clutch drains blood and stamina, weakening prey.
name: Hungering Grip

desc: Fight through wounds that would incapacitate mortals; -3 damage reduction for scene.
name: Unholy Endurance

desc: Growl startles animals, causes stampedes, or mortals hesitate in fear; -1 to attack rolls.
name: Ferine Snarl

desc: Gain automatic +2 to all attack rolls when activated in battle.
name: Crimson Frenzy

desc: Gatherings bend to your rhythm; conversations stall, eyes fix, people forget time.
name: Pale Host

desc: Curse those who break loyalty/pacts; torments in dreams until reparations.
name: Oathbreaker's Curse

desc: Blood carries nobility; mortals treat you as authority.
name: Lineage's Weight

desc: Silence an individual's voice for minutes.
name: Crown of Silence

desc: Appear as perfectly lifeless, even to machines.
name: Corpse Flesh

desc: Command shades and dead memories from the Ark's databanks or ghosts.
name: Grave Whisper

desc: Phase into shadows or thin walls like a wraith.
name: Void Step

desc: Draw hun-fragments or memories from mortals and spirits.
name: Soul Extraction

desc: Reveal moral/karmic stains in others; relive corruption.
name: Aura of Judgment

desc: Restore harmony in mortals/systems disrupted by chi imbalance.
name: Chi Balance

desc: Impose commands that compel obedience from mortals/lesser spirits.
name: Mandate of Heaven

desc: Channel yang chi into blinding aura of justice that burns corrupt.
name: Solar Radiance

desc: Pass perfectly for living mortals, radiate body heat.
name: Life Mask

desc: Feed on sex, food, or strong emotion as well as blood/breath.
name: Chi Feast

desc: Burst of vital Yang Chi energy: leap, heal, ignite passion; leaves user drained.
name: Elemental Surge

desc: Explode in brilliant yang energy, burning enemies and invigorating allies.
name: Dance of Ten Thousand Fires

desc: Inflict agony that transcends physical pain, cutting to the soul.
name: Searing Agony

desc: Flay own flesh to gain Yin Chi; wounds take time to heal but never hungry.
name: Skinning the Self

desc: Manifest monstrous, oni-like form that terrifies mortals.
name: Hell's Visage

desc: Force an enemy to relive karmic sins and suffer their own torment.
name: Dharma Crucible

desc: Perfectly mimic mannerisms, accents, and subtle details of mortals.
name: Mortal Veil

desc: Swap between multiple crafted personas, each with unique resonance.
name: Cycle of Faces

desc: Plant false recollections or alter small pieces of another's past.
name: Memory Weaving

desc: Control the physical actions of an individual briefly. The victim is aware of losing control.
name: Puppet Master

desc: Pick one: telescopic vision, echolocation, enhanced smell, or heat sensing. +1 Perception using chosen sense.
name: Hybrid Senses

desc: Temporarily adapt to the environment, e.g., gills, wings, etc.
name: Adaptive Morph

desc: Briefly mimic last observed power of a target creature.
name: Echo Mutation

desc: Harden shifted form, granting +4 HP. Can be activated once per scene.
name: Armored Form

desc: Gain additional eyes to detect magical energy and spells.
name: Chimerical Eyes

desc: Channel mana into natural weapons; Mental modifier to hit; adds +6 damage to attacks.
name: Mana Claw

desc: Create mana drones that can speak or channel energy-based powers.
name: Whispling

desc: Grow an additional mouth for one extra bite attack per turn.
name: Hungering Maw

desc: Create intense gravity area; Mental vs Physical: fail = grappled & damage, success = damage only.
name: Gravity Grasp

desc: Grow an extra limb temporarily.
name: Out on a Limb

desc: Create a blinding flash of unnatural light; Mental vs Defense (10 + Physical) to blind.
name: Eldritch Flash

desc: Fire a beam of unstable mana; Mental vs Defense (10 + Dex), 8 + Mental damage.
name: Eldritch Maser

desc: Create restraints or barriers from silk.
name: Web Spinning

desc: Harden carapace, reducing physical damage by 3 for 2 turns; can only be used once per scene.
name: Carapace Armor

desc: Inject paralytic or necrotic venom with a successful attack.
name: Venom Sting

desc: Scale walls and ceilings effortlessly.
name: Wall-Crawl

desc: Telepathic communication with nearby Insectoids who share this power.
name: Hive Mind

desc: Emit noxious gas impairing mental stats (-3) in a 5 ft radius for 3 turns.
name: Stink Cloud

desc: Create a droning sound that disrupts concentration and actions; can maintain each turn but forbids other actions.
name: Buzzing

desc: Grants 360Â° vision even in human form.
name: Compound Eyes

desc: Paralyzing sting grants an extra attack each turn; target rolls Physical to resist paralysis.
name: Wasp Sting

desc: Restrain target with a mana cocoon; target can resist with a Mental roll.
name: Mana Cocoon

desc: Temporarily lift, carry, or throw objects several times their size; +1 Strength.
name: Bugs Might

desc: Bite delivers poison that slows victim (-1 Dex); resisted by Physical roll.
name: Venom Fang

desc: Natural armor reduces incoming damage by 2 for 3 turns.
name: Scalehide

desc: Grapple target and optionally constrict each turn; target may resist with Physical roll.
name: Constrictor's Coil

desc: Detach a limb harmlessly; limb regenerates before reuse.
name: Detach

desc: Remove maladies, sickness, or poison; cleanses conditions.
name: Shed Skin

desc: Spit poisonous projectile; target rolls Physical to resist poison and damage.
name: Poison Spit

desc: Blend with surroundings; grants +2 to Hide checks while stationary.
name: Chameleon's Mantle

desc: Temporarily trance target; can last one scene. Mental roll to resist every 2 turns.
name: Hypnotizing Gaze

desc: Detect heat and thermal differences.
name: Heat Sense

desc: Perfect clarity at range and in darkness.
name: Keen Sight

desc: Disorient/stun targets; Mental roll to resist.
name: Piercing Cry

desc: Strike from above; knock target prone on failed Dex.
name: Predatory Dive

desc: Reinforce wings with blade structures; add Dex to attack when flying.
name: Wing Blades

desc: Fire wing blades as projectiles; requires Wing Blades active.
name: Wing Darts

desc: Summon mana spirit flock to scout or attack; see through their eyes.
name: Conspiracy to Murder

desc: Mimic a voice heard in last 24 hours.
name: Voice Mimic

desc: Send message via summoned spirit to a familiar target.
name: A Little Bird Told Me

desc: Enhanced flight speed.
name: Moving at Hyper Squawk

desc: Jagged beak causes bleeding effect; +1 damage per turn.
name: Ripping Pecks

desc: Echolocation or pressure detection; reveals hidden/invisible creatures, traps, and doors.
name: Abyssal Sense

desc: Burst of speed in water or zero-G.
name: Surge Strike

desc: Bite that can shear most materials; +3 damage.
name: Crushing Bite

desc: Damage attackers who strike the Aquatic with claws/flesh; 1 damage per strike.
name: Rough Skin

desc: Pull water from air to fire as projectile; 3 uses per scene without external water source.
name: Aqua Shot

desc: Consume inorganic items harmlessly.
name: Consume

desc: Sharpen teeth in human form to perform bite attacks.
name: Chomp-Chomp

desc: Conduct electricity through body; shocks target, 2 uses per scene.
name: Eel's Spite

desc: Camouflage in water; +2 to Hide checks if perfectly still.
name: Still Water

desc: Sonic ring pushes enemies away; resisted with Physical roll.
name: Echo Pulse

desc: After successful bite, lock jaws and spin prey; damage + disorient; hold 3 turns or until released.
name: Death Roll

desc: Claws and teeth deal devastating damage.
name: Savage Rend

desc: Creatures within earshot must roll Mental; failure: cannot approach and attack rolls suffer -1.
name: Alpha's Roar

desc: Charge in straight line; deals damage; Dex roll to resist knockdown.
name: Unstoppable Charge

desc: Track chosen scent; lasts 24 hours or until dispelled.
name: Scent Lock

desc: Claws may cause sickness/poison; -2 Strength & Fortitude; resisted by Physical roll.
name: Cat Scratch Fever

desc: Cone of force from roar/howl; Physical roll to resist.
name: Howling Cannon

desc: See in total darkness; visualize infrared.
name: Cat's Eye

desc: Mark area with scent, claws, or other method; supernatural awareness of mark; alerts allies.
name: Marking Territory

desc: Replay memories or dreams as visible illusions.
name: Dream Recall

desc: Enter data flows as a ghost; traverse archives, retrieve information, interact remotely.
name: Archive Walk

desc: Cloak oneself in another's likeness; visual and auditory mimicry.
name: Identity Mask

desc: Hear voices through vents, wires, or channels; gain information remotely.
name: Whisper Stitch

desc: Accelerate plant growth instantly; create cover, obstacles, or effects.
name: Verdant Surge

desc: Awaken longing, creativity, or passion; influence targets emotionally.
name: Charm of Bloom

desc: Overwhelm mortals with cosmic visions; -1 Mental for 1 turn, may dazzle/distract.
name: Starlit Gaze

desc: Bend or refract light; become partially transparent or dazzling.
name: Astral Reflection

desc: Create sensory or physical magical effects (lights, voices, smells, vibrations).
name: Thaumaturgy

desc: Recall residual magical effects recently cast in an area.
name: Magic of Echoes

desc: Draw energy from nearby ley lines to enhance a spell; +2 flat bonus to damage or effect.
name: Ley Pull

desc: Locate magical nodes or high-energy areas; utility/planning.
name: Ley Mapping

desc: Influence devices/systems with technomancy; ritualized activation.
name: Ritual Magitech

desc: Cybernetic tattoos act as conduits for technomancy; repeated use reduces TN.
name: Systemic Runes

desc: Manipulate technology through will and magic; switch on/off, move, or alter machines.
name: Tecno-Manipulation

desc: Create digital/magical servitors; deliver messages, activate devices, distract targets.
name: Cyber Sprites

desc: Burst of mental energy disrupts thought; confusion, memory loss.
name: Mindshatter Pulse

desc: Move, lift, hurl, or crush objects with mental force.
name: Telekinetic Surge

desc: Read surface thoughts/emotional states; replay memories, sense intentions.
name: Cognitive Echo

desc: Link minds for shared thoughts, sensations, coordinated action.
name: Neural Web

desc: Generate fire/heat, manipulate thermal energy, create fire bursts.
name: Flame of Will

desc: Precognition, retrocognition, probability shaping; grants tactical info.
name: Eyes Beyond Time

desc: Absorb, redirect, or manipulate emotions and memories; -1 Mental for 1â3 turns.
name: Memory and Emotion Sculpt

desc: Enhance body functions temporarily (speed, reflexes, strength); +1 Phys or Dex for 1â3 turns.
name: Biokinetics

desc: Create/manipulate chaotic psychic energy; 8 + Mental damage.
name: Psychokinetics
